    • Method Detail

      • executeInBackground

        protected static javax.swing.SwingWorker<?,?> executeInBackground(CcddMain ccddMain,
                                               CcddBackgroundCommand.BackgroundCommand backCommand)
        Execute a command in the background. The mouse cursor for the main window is set to the 'wait' cursor and the main window's menu items are disabled for the duration of the command execution. Once complete, any clean-up steps are performed, the cursor is restored, and the menu items are reenabled
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class reference
        backCommand - background command
        Returns:
        SwingWorker reference for this thread

      • executeInBackground

        protected static javax.swing.SwingWorker<?,?> executeInBackground(CcddMain ccddMain,
                                               java.awt.Component dialog,
                                               CcddBackgroundCommand.BackgroundCommand backCommand)
        Execute a command in the background. The mouse cursor for the specified component is set to the 'wait' cursor and the main window's menu items are disabled for the duration of the command execution. Once complete, any clean-up steps are performed, the cursor is restored, and the menu items are reenabled
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class reference
        dialog - reference to the dialog responsible for this operation; null if not applicable
        backCommand - background command
        Returns:
        SwingWorker reference for this thread
